comments_since_last_sample.body: Plot twist: that thing is cursed with the spirit of a dead child.

top_comments_top.body:
I'm trying to wrap my head around spending so much effort into making something only to potentially throw it away.

That's an awesome find.
Curious if someone made it for them and that relationship has ran out of lives.
Too good to be true, probably haunted.  Please report back if experiencing unexpected ectoplasm or symmetrical book stacking.
Acquire a gerbil and a tiny plumber costume. Earn 5000,- from YouTube.

https://www.gamesbite.com/chad-valley-wood-shed-fire-police-station-rrp-29-99-lot-b5336-5422504.html

I thought it looked familiar, my son has it. It's a Police and fire station play set. Awesome conversion!
r/jackhadkebabs
